files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Attributes.Attribute
files.Summary: Represents a character attribute that extends BoundedValue functionality. An attribute is a measurable characteristic such as strength, dexterity, luck, and so on. Can have a min and a max value.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Attributes.AttributeChangeInfo
files.Summary: Immutable structure that contains information about an attribute value change. Used to track and communicate attribute modifications across the system.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Attributes.AttributeMenuItems
files.Summary: Provides Unity Editor menu items for creating attributes.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Attributes.AttributeSet
files.Summary: A ScriptableObject that defines a collection of attributes for use in character systems. Attribute sets are usually used to group attributes that can be shared across different characters or classes. For example, any character of any class could have the same attribute set, including attributes like strength, dexterity, constitution, intelligence, and luck.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Attributes.AttributeSetInstance
files.Summary: Represents a runtime instance of an AttributeSet with actual values for each attribute. Provides methods to manipulate and access attribute values during gameplay.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Attributes.AttributeSetInstanceExtensions
files.Summary: Extension methods for converting SerializableDictionary to AttributeSetInstance.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Attributes.AttributeSetMenuItems
files.Summary: Provides Unity Editor menu items for creating attribute sets.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Attributes.EntityAttributes
files.Summary: Manages the attributes of an entity. This component calculates attribute values by combining base values, flat modifiers, percentage modifiers, and spent attribute points. It requires an component on the same GameObject.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Attributes.IHasAttributeSet
files.Summary: Interface for objects that expose an AttributeSet definition.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Classes.Class
files.Summary: Represents a character class in the RPG system. It can be used to define how attributes and stats grow over levels.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Classes.ClassMenuItems
files.Summary: Provides a menu item in the Unity Editor to create a Class asset.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Classes.EntityClass
files.Summary: Component that represents the class of an entity in the game. Implements to provide access to the entity's class definition.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Classes.IClassSource
files.Summary: Interface for objects that provide a source of a class. In RPG games, a class typically defines the role or profession of an entity, such as a warrior, mage, or rogue.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.EntityCore
files.Summary: The core component for any entity in the game. It is the mandatory base class for all entities, providing essential functionality. Provides easy access to the entity's level, stats, and attributes.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.AttributeChangedGameEvent
files.Summary: Game event that is raised when an attribute changes. Contains information about the attribute that changed, including its previous and new values.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.AttributeChangedGameEventListener
files.Summary: Game event that is raised when an attribute changes. Contains information about the attribute that changed, including its previous and new values.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.EntityCoreGameEvent
files.Summary: Game event that carries EntityCore data. Used for events that need to pass information about an entity's core component.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.EntityCoreGameEventListener
files.Summary: Game event that carries EntityCore data. Used for events that need to pass information about an entity's core component.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.EntityLeveledDownGameEvent
files.Summary:
Event to notify the decrease of the level of an entity. Parameters are:

  • the entity that changed level
  • the new level

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.EntityLeveledDownGameEventListener
files.Summary:
Event to notify the decrease of the level of an entity. Parameters are:

  • the entity that changed level
  • the new level

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.EntityLeveledUpGameEvent
files.Summary:
Event to notify the increase of the level of an entity. Parameters are:

  • the entity that changed level
  • the new level

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.EntityLeveledUpGameEventListener
files.Summary:
Event to notify the increase of the level of an entity. Parameters are:

  • the entity that changed level
  • the new level

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.GameEvent
files.Summary: A ScriptableObject-based event system that allows decoupled communication between game systems. GameEvents can be raised to notify all registered listeners without requiring direct references.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.GameEventGenerator.EventParameter.NativeType
files.Summary: Enumeration of supported native C# types for event parameters.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.GameEventGenerator.EventParameter.ParameterType
files.Summary: Enumeration defining whether the parameter is a native type, a custom MonoScript type, or an enum.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.GameEventGenerator.EventParameter
files.Summary: Represents a parameter that can be passed to a generated game event. Supports both native C# types and custom MonoScript-based types.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.GameEventGenerator.GameEventDefinition
files.Summary: Defines a complete game event with its name, parameters, and metadata. Contains all information needed to generate the corresponding C# classes.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.GameEventGenerator
files.Summary: A ScriptableObject tool for automatically generating GameEvent and GameEventListener classes. Allows developers to define event schemas and generate strongly-typed event classes at design time.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.GameEventGeneric1<T>
files.Summary: A generic ScriptableObject-based event system that can carry one parameter of type T. Supports both MonoBehaviour-based listeners and code-based Action listeners.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.GameEventGeneric2<T, U>
files.Summary: A generic ScriptableObject-based event system that can carry two parameters of types T and U. Supports both MonoBehaviour-based listeners and code-based Action listeners.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.GameEventGeneric3<T, U, W>
files.Summary: A generic ScriptableObject-based event system that can carry three parameters of types T, U, and W. Supports both MonoBehaviour-based listeners and code-based Action listeners.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.GameEventGeneric4<T, U, W, K>
files.Summary: A generic ScriptableObject-based event system that can carry four parameters of types T, U, W, and K. Supports both MonoBehaviour-based listeners and code-based Action listeners.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.GameEventListener
files.Summary: MonoBehaviour component that listens to GameEvent objects and responds with UnityEvents. Automatically registers and unregisters itself when enabled/disabled.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.GameEventListenerGeneric1<T>
files.Summary: MonoBehaviour component that listens to GameEventGeneric1 objects and responds with UnityEvents. Automatically registers and unregisters itself when enabled/disabled.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.GameEventListenerGeneric2<T, U>
files.Summary: MonoBehaviour component that listens to GameEventGeneric2 objects and responds with UnityEvents. Automatically registers and unregisters itself when enabled/disabled.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.GameEventListenerGeneric3<T, U, W>
files.Summary: MonoBehaviour component that listens to GameEventGeneric3 objects and responds with UnityEvents. Automatically registers and unregisters itself when enabled/disabled.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.GameEventListenerGeneric4<T, U, W, K>
files.Summary: MonoBehaviour component that listens to GameEventGeneric4 objects and responds with UnityEvents. Automatically registers and unregisters itself when enabled/disabled.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.IRaisable<T>
files.Summary: Interface for objects that can be raised with one parameter of type T. Defines the contract for events that carry a single piece of data.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.IRaisable<T, U>
files.Summary: Interface for objects that can be raised with two parameters of types T and U. Defines the contract for events that carry two pieces of data.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.IRaisable<T, U, V>
files.Summary: Interface for objects that can be raised with three parameters of types T, U, and V. Defines the contract for events that carry three pieces of data.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.IRaisable<T, U, V, W>
files.Summary: Interface for objects that can be raised with four parameters of types T, U, V, and W. Defines the contract for events that carry four pieces of data.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.IntGameEvent
files.Summary: Game event that carries integer data. A general-purpose event for passing integer values between game systems.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.IntGameEventListener
files.Summary: Game event that carries integer data. A general-purpose event for passing integer values between game systems.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.StatChangedGameEvent
files.Summary: Game event that is raised when a stat changes. Contains information about the stat that changed, including its previous and new values.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Events.StatChangedGameEventListener
files.Summary: Game event that is raised when a stat changes. Contains information about the stat that changed, including its previous and new values.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Experience.EntityLevel
files.Summary: Represents the level and experience system of an entity in the RPG framework. Handles experience gain, level progression, and experience-based calculations. Implements to provide standard leveling functionality.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Experience.ExpSource
files.Summary: A MonoBehaviour component that provides a source of experience points. Implements and can only be harvested once. Once harvested, subsequent calls to Exp will return 0.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Experience.IExpSource
files.Summary: Interface for objects that can provide experience points. Defines the contract for experience sources that can be harvested.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Experience.ILevelable
files.Summary: Interface for entities that have a leveling system based on experience points. Provides the core functionality for level progression and experience management.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Scaling.ScalingComponent
files.Summary: Abstract base class for all scaling components. A scaling component calculates a value based on an entity's properties.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Scaling.ScalingComponents.AttributeScalingComponentMenuItems
files.Summary: Provides a menu item in the Unity Editor to create an AttributesScalingComponent asset.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Scaling.ScalingComponents.AttributesScalingComponent
files.Summary: A scaling component that calculates a value based on an entity's attributes.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Scaling.ScalingComponents.StatScalingComponentMenuItems
files.Summary: Provides a menu item in the Unity Editor to create a StatsScalingComponent asset.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Scaling.ScalingComponents.StatsScalingComponent
files.Summary: A scaling component that calculates a value based on an entity's stats.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Scaling.ScalingFormula
files.Summary: Represents a formula to calculate a value based on values returned by several scaling components. The calculation of each scaling component can either be based on the "self" entity (the entity that owns the formula) or the "target" entity (the entity that will be targeted by the action). For example, a scaling formula for an attack that deals the more damage the higher the enemy's armor is, can use the "self" entity to calculate the damage based on the attacker's stats and the "target" entity to calculate additional damage based on the target's armor. The final damage will be the sum of the value returned by the two scaling components.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Scaling.ScalingFormulaMenuItems
files.Summary: Provides a menu item in the Unity Editor to create a ScalingFormula asset.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Scaling.SoSetScalingComponentBase<SetType, KeyType>
files.Summary: Abstract base class for scaling components that work with ScriptableObject-based sets.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Stats.EntityStats
files.Summary:
Component that manages the statistics of an entity in the game. It handles base stats, flat stat modifiers, stat to stat modifiers, and percentage stat modifiers.
Base stats can either be fixed or come from the entity's class (if one is available on the Game Object). When stats change because of a modifier of any kind, the assigned is raised.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Stats.IHasStatSet
files.Summary: Interface for objects that provide a source of stat sets. Defines the contract for accessing a StatSet that contains stat definitions.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Stats.Stat
files.Summary: Represents a stat in the RPG system that extends BoundedValue with attribute scaling capabilities. Stats can be scaled based on entity attributes and provide equality comparison based on name.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Stats.StatChangeInfo
files.Summary: Contains information about a stat change event, including the entity, stat, and old/new values. Used for tracking and responding to stat modifications.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Stats.StatMenuItems
files.Summary: Provides Unity Editor menu items for creating Stat assets.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Stats.StatSet
files.Summary: A ScriptableObject that defines a collection of stats that can be used by entities. Implements IStatContainer to provide stat containment functionality.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Stats.StatSetInstance
files.Summary: Represents an instance of a StatSet with actual values for each stat. Implements IEnumerable and IStatContainer to provide collection functionality.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Stats.StatSetMenuItems
files.Summary: Provides Unity Editor menu items for creating StatSet assets.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Stats.StatToStatModifier
files.Summary: A ScriptableObject that defines how one stat can scale upon another stat basing on a percentage. Used to create relationships between different stats in the RPG system.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Stats.StatToStatModifierMenuItems
files.Summary: Provides Unity Editor menu items for creating StatToStatModifier assets.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.BoundedValue
files.Summary: Abstract base class for values that can be bounded by minimum and maximum limits. Provides functionality to define optional min/max constraints and clamp values within those bounds.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.Cache<KType, VType>
files.Summary: A generic cache class that provides basic caching functionality.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.GrowthFormula
files.Summary: Represents a formula to calculate growth values for different levels, up to a maximum level.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.GrowthFormulaMenuItems
files.Summary: Provides a menu item in the Unity Editor to create a GrowthFormula asset.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.IValidatable
files.Summary: Interface for objects that support validation events in the Unity Editor. This allows other components to subscribe and react when an object is validated (typically through OnValidate in the inspector).

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.IValueContainer<T>
files.Summary: Interface for objects that can contain and query values. Provides a standardized way to check for value containment across different value containers.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.IValueProvider<KeyType, ReturnType>
files.Summary: Provides a method to retrieve a value based on a key.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.InitializationUtils
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for initializing and refreshing collections during object setup. Contains helper methods commonly used during component initialization and validation.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.IntRef
files.Summary: A reference to an integer value. Can either be a constant value or a reference to an ScriptableObject.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.IntVar
files.Summary: ScriptableObject that holds an integer value. Can be used to share an integer value between different GameObjects and scenes.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.LongRef
files.Summary: A reference to a long value. Can either be a constant value or a reference to a ScriptableObject.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.LongVar
files.Summary: ScriptableObject that holds a long value. Can be used to share a long value between different GameObjects and scenes.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.Percentage
files.Summary:
The Percentage class represents a percentage value and provides various operators and conversions.
Implicit long to Percentage value conversion is available. To express a 100% value, use 100L.
Implicit Percentage to double conversion is available. When doing so, the percentage is automatically divided by 100.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.SerKeyValPair<T, U>
files.Summary: A serializable key-value pair structure that can be used in Unity's inspector. Provides implicit conversion to and from the standard KeyValuePair.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.SerializableDictionary<TKey, TValue>
files.Summary: A serializable dictionary implementation that can be displayed and edited in the Unity Inspector. Provides all standard dictionary functionality while maintaining Unity serialization compatibility.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.SerializableHashSet<T>
files.Summary: A serializable hash set implementation that can be displayed and edited in the Unity Inspector. Provides all standard hash set functionality while maintaining Unity serialization compatibility.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.TypeSelectableAttribute
files.Summary: Custom attribute to mark fields for SerializeReference type selection. Apply this to [SerializeReference] fields to enable type selection dropdown.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.UI.DefaultAttributeCompactDisplaySONameProvider
files.Summary: Attribute display name provider that returns a compact version of the attribute's name.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.UI.DefaultDisplaySONameProvider<T>
files.Summary: Default implementation of IDisplayNameProvider that returns the asset's name property.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.UI.IDisplaySONameProvider<T>
files.Summary: Provides display names for ScriptableObject assets. This interface allows for flexible presentation strategies, including localization.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgFramework.Utils.ValidationError
files.Summary: Represents a validation error that occurred during formula evaluation.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Config.IAstraRpgHealthConfig
files.Summary: Interface for health system configuration. This allows for dependency injection and easier testing.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.CalculationPipeline.ApplyBarrierStep
files.Summary: Damage step that consumes target barrier (temporary shields). It doesn't remove health.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.CalculationPipeline.ApplyCriticalMultiplierStep
files.Summary: Damage step that applies critical hit multipliers when the current damage is flagged as critical.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.CalculationPipeline.ApplyDefenseStep
files.Summary: Damage step that applies defensive calculations based on the damage type's defensive and piercing stats and configured reduction functions.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.CalculationPipeline.ApplyDmgModifiersStep
files.Summary: Damage step that applies generic and configured damage source/type modifiers (for example weaknesses and resistances) to the current damage amount.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.CalculationPipeline.DamageCalculationStrategy
files.Summary: ScriptableObject that defines a configurable damage calculation pipeline. The pipeline is composed of ordered instances executed sequentially.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.CalculationPipeline.DamageInfo
files.Summary: Container for damage pipeline state while a damage calculation is executed. Holds the amounts being transformed, the source/type metadata and accumulated prevention reasons.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.CalculationPipeline.DamageStep
files.Summary: Base class for a single step in the damage calculation pipeline. A performs a focused transformation on a instance (for example applying defenses, barriers or modifiers).

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamageAmountInfo.StepAmountRecord
files.Summary: Immutable record representing the damage value before and after a single pipeline phase (identified by the phase type).

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamageAmountInfo
files.Summary: Holds numeric details related to an attempt to apply damage, allowing intermediate values to be recorded for each phase of the calculation pipeline (e.g. reductions, resistances, absorptions).

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamageOutcome
files.Summary: The overall result of attempting to apply damage to a target. Use this in to indicate whether any damage was applied or if the attempt was prevented.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamagePreventionReason
files.Summary: Flags that explain why a damage attempt was prevented. Multiple reasons may be combined. These flags are used in when an attempt is prevented.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamagePreventionReasonExtensions
files.Summary: Extension helpers for .

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamageResolution
files.Summary: The result returned by damage application attempts. Encapsulates whether the damage was applied or prevented, the reasons for prevention, and the concrete damage information that was ultimately applied (if any).

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamageSource
files.Summary: Defines a damage source asset that identifies how damage was produced (for example: a spell, trap, environmental hazard, system event, etc.). Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Damage Source.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.DamageType
files.Summary: Scriptable asset that describes a damage category (for example: Physical, Fire, Poison). A DamageType declares which stat reduces this damage, which reduction functions to use, whether a stat pierces its defensive stats and whether it ignores barriers. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / DamageType.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.IDamageable
files.Summary: Implemented by entities that can receive damage. The method accepts a record describing a pending damage attempt and returns a describing whether the damage was applied or prevented and additional details.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.PreDamageInfo.DamageInfoAmount
files.Summary: Fluent builder step: specify the damage amount.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.PreDamageInfo.DamageInfoDealer
files.Summary: Fluent builder step: specify the dealer entity.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.PreDamageInfo.DamageInfoSource
files.Summary: Fluent builder step: specify the damage source.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.PreDamageInfo.DamageInfoTarget
files.Summary: Fluent builder step: specify the target entity.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.PreDamageInfo.DamageInfoType
files.Summary: Fluent builder step: specify the damage type.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.PreDamageInfo.PreDamageInfoStepBuilder
files.Summary: Concrete step builder implementing the fluent interfaces. After setting required fields, optional flags (critical, multiplier) can be configured before calling .

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Damage.PreDamageInfo
files.Summary: Immutable container representing damage information before it is applied. Use to construct instances using the fluent step builder.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.DamageReductionFunctions.DamageReductionFn
files.Summary: Base type for damage reduction functions. Implementations compute how an incoming damage amount is reduced using a defensive statistic value.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Death.DestroyOnDeathStrategy
files.Summary: A death strategy that destroys the entity's when it dies. This is provided as a ScriptableObject to be reused across entities. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Death strategies / Destroy.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Death.DisableOnDeathStrategy
files.Summary: A death strategy that disables the entity's when it dies. This is useful for entities that should be hidden but not destroyed, allowing for resurrection. Pairs well with EnableOnResurrectionStrategy to re-enable the GameObject on resurrection. Provided as a ScriptableObject for easy assignment in the editor. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Death strategies / Disable.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Death.DoNothingOnDeathStrategy
files.Summary: A no-op death strategy. Use this when no action is required upon an entity's death. Provided as a ScriptableObject for easy assignment in the editor. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Death strategies / Do Nothing.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Death.MultipleOnDeathStrategy
files.Summary: A death strategy that executes multiple death strategies in order. This allows combining multiple death behaviors without creating new strategy classes. Provided as a ScriptableObject for easy assignment in the editor. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Death strategies / Multiple.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Death.OnDeathStrategy
files.Summary: Base strategy type for handling an entity's death. Derive from this class and implement to define custom death behavior.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.DefenseReductionFunctions.DefenseReductionFn
files.Summary: Base type for defense reduction functions. Implementations compute a reduced defense value based on a piercing stat and the pierced defense stat.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.DefenseReductionFunctions.DefenseReductionFunctions.FlatDefenseReductionFn
files.Summary: Reduces defense by subtracting a scaled amount of the piercing stat from the pierced defense. The result is clamped to the stat's min/max bounds. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Def Reduction Functions / Flat Def Reduction.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.DefenseReductionFunctions.DefenseReductionFunctions.LogDefenseReductionFn
files.Summary: Applies a logarithmic divisive reduction to defense to provide diminishing returns as piercing increases. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Def Reduction Functions / Log Def Reduction.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.DefenseReductionFunctions.DefenseReductionFunctions.PercentageDefenseReductionFn
files.Summary: Reduces defense by subtracting a percentage of the pierced defense equal to the piercing stat percentage. Example: piercingStatValue = 20 -> reduces defense by 20%. Create isntances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Def Reduction Functions / Log Def Reduction.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.EntityHealth
files.Summary: Manages the health, damage, and healing mechanics for an entity. Handles damage calculation, health regeneration, barriers (temporary HP), and death events.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.DamageResolutionGameEvent
files.Summary: Used to notify whether a damage was applied or prevented.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.DamageResolutionGameEventListener
files.Summary: Used to notify whether a damage was applied or prevented.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityDiedGameEvent
files.Summary: The entity died.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityDiedGameEventListener
files.Summary: The entity died.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityGainedHealthGameEvent
files.Summary: The entity gained some health.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityGainedHealthGameEventListener
files.Summary: The entity gained some health.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityHealedGameEvent
files.Summary: The entity received an healing.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityHealedGameEventListener
files.Summary: The entity received an healing.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityLostHealthGameEvent
files.Summary: The entity lost some health.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityLostHealthGameEventListener
files.Summary: The entity lost some health.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityMaxHealthChangedGameEvent
files.Summary: The entity whose Max HP changed, the new Max HP, and the old Max HP.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityMaxHealthChangedGameEventListener
files.Summary: The entity whose Max HP changed, the new Max HP, and the old Max HP.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityResurrectedGameEvent
files.Summary: The entity resurrected with the specified amount of health.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.EntityResurrectedGameEventListener
files.Summary: The entity resurrected with the specified amount of health.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.PreHealGameEvent
files.Summary: THe entity is about to be healed.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Events.PreHealGameEventListener
files.Summary: THe entity is about to be healed.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Exceptions.DeadEntityException
files.Summary: Exception thrown when attempting to perform health-modifying operations on a dead entity. This exception indicates a programming error where the caller attempted to heal, damage, or otherwise modify the health of an entity that has already died.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Experience.ExpCollector
files.Summary: Collects experience when this entity deals killing blows. Requires an on the GameObject.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.HealAmountInfo
files.Summary: Represents the different numeric stages of a heal amount as it is processed: the raw requested amount, the amount after applying a heal modifier, and the final net amount applied.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.HealSource
files.Summary: Defines a heal source asset that identifies how a heal was produced (e.g. spell, potion, resurrection, system, ...). Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Heal Source.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.IHealable
files.Summary: Interface for entities that can receive healing. Implementers apply healing based on the provided .

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.LifestealAmountSelector
files.Summary: Selects which damage amount will be used as the basis for lifesteal calculations.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.LifestealBasisMode
files.Summary: Specifies which damage value should be used as the basis for lifesteal calculations.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.LifestealConfig
files.Summary: ScriptableObject for configuring lifesteal mappings for different damage types.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.LifestealStatConfig
files.Summary: Configuration that associates a lifesteal Stat and HealSource with an optional amount selector.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.PreHealInfo.HealInfoAmount
files.Summary: Builder step interface for specifying the heal amount.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.PreHealInfo.HealInfoHealer
files.Summary: Builder step interface for specifying the healer entity and optional extras.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.PreHealInfo.HealInfoSource
files.Summary: Builder step interface for specifying the heal source.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.PreHealInfo.PreHealInfoStepBuilder
files.Summary: Concrete builder implementing the fluent step interfaces to construct a .

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.PreHealInfo
files.Summary: Immutable description of a pending heal operation that can be passed through heal processing logic before the actual health change is applied.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.ReceivedHealInfo.HealInfoAmount
files.Summary: Builder step: provide the heal amount.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.ReceivedHealInfo.HealInfoHealer
files.Summary: Builder step: provide the healer entity.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.ReceivedHealInfo.HealInfoSource
files.Summary: Builder step: provide the heal source.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.ReceivedHealInfo.HealInfoTarget
files.Summary: Builder step: provide the target entity and finalize options.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.ReceivedHealInfo.ReceivedHealInfoStepBuilder
files.Summary: Concrete fluent builder used to assemble a . Use to start.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.ReceivedHealInfo
files.Summary: Represents the result of a heal operation as actually received by the target. Contains the resolved heal amount, source, involved entities and whether it was critical.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Heal.StepValuePoint
files.Summary: Selects whether to use the pre-step or post-step value when is selected.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Resurrection.DoNothingOnResurrectionStrategy
files.Summary: A no-op resurrection strategy. Use this when no action is required upon an entity's resurrection. Provided as a ScriptableObject for easy assignment in the editor. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Resurrection strategies / Do Nothing.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Resurrection.EnableOnResurrectionStrategy
files.Summary: A resurrection strategy that enables the entity's when it is resurrected. This is useful when using a death strategy that disables the GameObject (e.g., DisableOnDeathStrategy). Provided as a ScriptableObject for easy assignment in the editor. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Resurrection strategies / Enable.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Resurrection.MultipleOnResurrectionStrategy
files.Summary: A resurrection strategy that executes multiple resurrection strategies in order. This allows combining multiple resurrection behaviors without creating new strategy classes. Provided as a ScriptableObject for easy assignment in the editor. Create instances via Assets -> Create -> Astra RPG Health / Resurrection strategies / Multiple.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Resurrection.OnResurrectionStrategy
files.Summary: Base strategy type for handling an entity's resurrection. Derive from this class and implement to define custom resurrection behavior.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Resurrection.ResurrectionInfo
files.Summary: Contains information about an entity resurrection event.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Scaling.ScalingComponents.HealthScalingComponent
files.Summary: A scaling component that calculates a value based on an entity's health values.

files.Title: ElectricDrill.AstraRpgHealth.Scaling.ScalingComponents.HealthScalingComponentMenuItems
files.Summary: Provides a menu item in the Unity Editor to create a HealthScalingComponent asset.
